snippet: Stanley shot a bogey-free 65, coming from eights shots behind to earn his first PGA Tour title, one stroke ahead of Ben Crane and two ahead of the third-round leader, Spencer Levin.
abstract: Kyle Stanley comes back from an eight-stroke deficit to win the Phoenix Open golf tournament, his first PGA Tour title.
lead_paragraph: Stanley shot a bogey-free 65, coming from eights shots behind to earn his first PGA Tour title, one stroke ahead of Ben Crane and two ahead of the third-round leader, Spencer Levin.

headline.seo: Kyle Stanley Wins Phoenix Open a Week After Losing in a Playoff
headline.main: A Week After Blowing a Five-Shot Lead, Stanley Rallies From Eight Behind to Win
headline.print_headline: A Week After Blowing a Five-Shot Lead, Stanley Rallies From Eight Behind to Win
